AssociateRepository.name: AssociateRepository
AssociateRepository.description: Grants permission to associates a repository with Amazon CodeGuru Reviewer
AssociateRepository.dependentActions:
codecommit:ListRepositories
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   codecommit:TagResource
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   events:PutRule
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   events:PutTargets
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   iam:CreateServiceLinkedRole
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   s3:CreateBucket
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   s3:ListBucket
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   s3:PutBucketPolicy
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   s3:PutLifecycleConfiguration

CreateCodeReview.name: CreateCodeReview
CreateCodeReview.description: Grants permission to create a code review

CreateConnectionToken.name: CreateConnectionToken
CreateConnectionToken.description: Grants permission to perform webbased oauth handshake for 3rd party providers

DescribeCodeReview.name: DescribeCodeReview
DescribeCodeReview.description: Grants permission to describe a code review

DescribeRecommendationFeedback.name: DescribeRecommendationFeedback
DescribeRecommendationFeedback.description: Grants permission to describe a recommendation feedback on a code review

DescribeRepositoryAssociation.name: DescribeRepositoryAssociation
DescribeRepositoryAssociation.description: Grants permission to describe a repository association

DisassociateRepository.name: DisassociateRepository
DisassociateRepository.description: Grants permission to disassociate a repository with Amazon CodeGuru Reviewer

GetMetricsData.name: GetMetricsData
GetMetricsData.description: Grants permission to view pull request metrics in console

ListCodeReviews.name: ListCodeReviews
ListCodeReviews.description: Grants permission to list summary of code reviews

ListRecommendationFeedback.name: ListRecommendationFeedback
ListRecommendationFeedback.description: Grants permission to list summary of recommendation feedback on a code review

ListRecommendations.name: ListRecommendations
ListRecommendations.description: Grants permission to list summary of recommendations on a code review

ListRepositoryAssociations.name: ListRepositoryAssociations
ListRepositoryAssociations.description: Grants permission to list summary of repository associations

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the resource attached to a associated repository ARN

ListThirdPartyRepositories.name: ListThirdPartyRepositories
ListThirdPartyRepositories.description: Grants permission to list 3rd party providers repositories in console

PutRecommendationFeedback.name: PutRecommendationFeedback
PutRecommendationFeedback.description: Grants permission to put feedback for a recommendation on a code review

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to attach resource tags to an associated repository ARN

UnTagResource.name: UnTagResource
UnTagResource.description: Grants permission to disassociate resource tags from an associated repository ARN
